info.name: Mapl API App
info.description:
In order to test and use it, please log in with the following credentials:

usuario

copy&pasteME-547

response.name: Delete DB

query.description: This command leave empty the db for a new searcg workflow

response.name: Fix multiple CVEs
Already fixed
Fix single CVE
Example Get "/" (Does not need auth)
response.body:
[
    "Los siguientes parámetros están disponibles: getVulns, postFixedVulns, getOpenVulns, getTotalVulnsBySeverity. Puede acceder a ellos desde cualquier lugar. Pero estos parámetros están protegidos. Por lo tanto si necesita acceder a ellos, comuníquese con quien le proporcionó este dominio o consulte la documentación.",
    "The following Endpoints are available: getVulns, postFixedVulns, getOpenVulns, getTotalVulnsBySeverity . You can reach them from everywhere. But these endpoints are protected. So, if you need to access them, please contact to whom give you this domain or look the documentation"
]
